# Dependencies
/node_modules
/.pnp
.pnp.js

# Testing
/coverage

# Production
/build
/dist
/out

# Next.js
/.next/
/out/

# Nuxt.js
/.nuxt/

# Gatsby
/public
.cache/
# Comment in the public line in if your project uses Gatsby and not Next.js
# https://nextjs.org/blog/next-9-1#public-directory-support
# public

# Storybook
/storybook-static

# Vite
*.local

# Temporary files
.temp/
.tmp/

# Logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
lerna-debug.log*

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE files
.vscode/*
!.vscode/settings.json
!.vscode/tasks.json
!.vscode/launch.json
!.vscode/extensions.json
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Typescript
*.tsbuildinfo

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Optional stylelint cache
.stylelintcache

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# dotenv environment variables file
.env
.env.development
.env.production

# parcel-bundler cache (https://parceljs.org/)
.cache
.parcel-cache

# Next.js build output
.next

# Remix build output
/build

# Serverless directories
.serverless/

# FuseBox cache
.fusebox/

# DynamoDB Local files
.dynamodb/

# TernJS port file
.tern-port

# Stores VSCode versions used for testing VSCode extensions
.vscode-test

# Vite specific
vite.config.js.timestamp-*
vite.config.ts.timestamp-*

# Temporary files created by vite
*.tmp
*.temp

# 3D directory for three.js or similar
/public/models
/textures
/shaders

# Cypress
cypress/videos/
cypress/screenshots/
cypress/downloads/

# Playwright
playwright-report/
test-results/

# Jest
jest-cache/

.vscode/*
!.vscode/extensions.json
.idea
.DS_Store
*.suo
